snippet: In Colorado, one town might embrace cannabis stores while another posts a keep-out sign. But on one thing they agree: leave your stoner humor at home.
abstract: Editorial notes that there is ongoing civil debate in Colorado about how best to approach marijuana legalization, as some towns still restrict selling the drug and others openly embrace it; contends that Colorado debate about marijuana seems years ahead of the rest of the country.
lead_paragraph: In Colorado, one town might embrace cannabis stores while another posts a keep-out sign. But on one thing they agree: leave your stoner humor at home.

headline.print_headline: High in the Rockies, a Chill Debate
headline.main: High in the Rockies, a Chill Marijuana Debate ​
